DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to help researchers learn about how the brain responds to rewards. This study is interested in seeing how these responses differ between people who are more and less responsive to insulin in their body, and people with and without depression.
DOC.brief_title: Brain Function in Depression and Insulin Resistance
